api_list.name: Convert

required_parameters.name: from
required_parameters.description: Currency from which you are converting.

required_parameters.name: to
required_parameters.description: Currency to which you are converting.

optional_parameters.name: amount
optional_parameters.description: (Optional) Amount value in From Currency. Default value is 1.

api_list.name: List
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://my-money-exchanger.p.rapidapi.com/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "my-money-exchanger.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
